description:
The cast celebrates the end of the year in various ways.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: End of the Year (Have a Wonderful New Year / Year-End Jumbo Lottery / New Year`s Fest / Pounding Mochi / Playing in the Snow / Playing in the Snow 2 / Kasa Jizou Statues / New Year`s Cards) / Discharge Notice 2017: The Youngest Brother Who Got Fired
Nenmatsu (Yoi Otoshi o / Nenmatsu Jumbo / New Year Fes / Mochitsuki / Yuki Asobi / Yuki Asobi 2 / Kasa Jizou / Nengajou) / Senryokugai Tsuukoku 2017: Kubi o Senkoku Sareta Suekko
年末 (よいお年を / 年末ジャンボ / ニューイヤーフェス / 餅つき / 雪遊び / 雪遊び② / かさじぞう / 年賀状) / 戦力外通告2017-クビを宣告された末っ子-
